title: School-Based Literary Reading Project Through Interactive Interactions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic literary appreciation skills and general understanding of elementary education environments
context.additional_context: Educational environment centered on interaction and peer feedback using digital devices

learning_goals: When designing education with literary works, learners can apply and evaluate at least three interactive engagement strategies.
Learners can plan and implement at least two literature appreciation activities that foster emotional engagement.
Learners can design a PBL-based literature reading project linked to science curricula and incorporate peer feedback at least three times.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
